recipe.title: Baked Rice With Cheese And Green Chilies
recipe.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Heat the oil in a small skillet. Add the onion and saute over low heat until lightly browned. In a mixing bowl, combine the onion with the rice and all the remaining ingredients. Stir together thoroughly. Pour the mixture into a lightly oiled, 1 1/2-quart baking casserole. Bake for 35 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and bubbly.

recipe.title: Crab dip
recipe.instructions: Mix

recipe.title: Edamame Succotash
recipe.instructions: Saute onion for 5 minutes Add edamame, corn, and red pepper and saute 3-5 minutes more Remove from heat and add vinegar

recipe.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipe.instructions: Peel eggplant and slice into 1/8 in. slices, salt and let drain for 30 min. Pat dry. Beat eggs wit 2 T water Dip eggplant slices into eggs and then into crumbs Heat 1/4 c. oil in large fry pan and saute eggplant slices until golden brown Continue cooking eggplant until all is sauteed, using additional oil if needed Place half the eggplant slices in 9 X 13 pan, sprinkle with 1/3 parmesan, 1/2 oregano, and 1/3 mozzarella. Cover with half the tomato sauce. Repeat layers, top with last of parmesan and mozzarella. Bake in preheated 350 oven 30 min, or until bubbly.

recipe.title: Favorite Corn Bread
recipe.instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add the milk, eggs and shortening; beat for 1 minute. Pour into a greased 9-in. square baking pan. Bake at 425 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until bread is golden brown and tests done.

recipe.title: Fettuccine with Summer Corn Sauce
recipe.instructions:
Cook fettuccine. Reserve 1/2 c. pasta water
Cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove and set aside. Add corn, garlic, salt and pepper. Cook until corn is tender. remove 3/4 cups corn and set aside. Transfer remaining corn mixture to a food processor. Add cheese, almonds, and oil. Process until blended. Return to skillet. Add reserved corn and heat through. Add fettuccine, bacon and basil. Add reserved pasta water to desired consistency. Add tomatoes.

recipe.title: Ginger Miso Soup with Arame

ingredient.item: Arame Seaweed; Soaked and Drained (or substitute Hijiki)

recipe.instructions: Soak 2 large pinches of aramae in a cup of fresh water for 5 minutes. Saute onion and mushrooms for 3 minutes, add ginger and saute 2 minutes more Add 4 c. water, bring to boil, and simmer for 5 minutes In a small bowl, disolve miso in some of hot liquid. Add dissolved miso, tofu, and soaked and drained arame to pot Simmer for 5 minutes, careful not to boil

recipe.title: Hot mushroom cheese spread
recipe.instructions: Mix Bake 20-25 min. 350 deb.

recipe.title: Karen Massey's Cheese Ball
recipe.instructions: Mix

recipe.title: Maine Lobster Lasagne
recipe.instructions:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a large bowl, stir together the ricotta cheese, eggs, half of the Cheddar, half of the mozzarella cheese and half of the Parmesan cheese. Mix in the onion, garlic, parsley and pepper.
Spread 1 1/2 cups of Alfredo sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Top with a layer of lasagna noodles. Arrange 1/3 of the lobster meat over the noodles, cover with 1/3 of the ricotta cheese mixture, then 1/3 of the spinach and then another layer of Alfredo sauce. Repeat this process two more times ending with sauce on top. Sprinkle the remainder of the Cheddar, mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses over the top. Give the whole pan a gentle shake to get everything settled in.
Bake, covered loosely with aluminum foil, for 45 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10 minutes or until the top is browned. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

recipe.title: Mock Chicken and Rice Casserole
recipe.instructions: Combine onion, celery, rice, soy chicken, and carrots and place in 2 qt. casserole dish. Combine remaining ingredients. Cook 3 minutes over medium heat. Pour over other ingredients. Cook at 350 degrees for 1 hour.

recipe.title: Parmesan Crusted Chicken
recipe.instructions: 1. In a shallo dish, combine flour, parmesan cheese. In another dish, lighly beat together eggs, garlic, and parsley. 2. Coat each chicken breast in egg mixture then dredge through flour mixture 3. Heat oil in saute pan over medium heat 4. Cook each chicken breast 6-10 min. on each side
recipe.modifications: Complete meal with spinach orzo or pasta parmesan

recipe.title: Penne Pasta with Pupmkin Sauce
recipe.instructions: Cook farfelle al dente Heat olive oil in large skillet Saute onion and pepper until soft (~3 min) Add garlic and saute another 2 minutes Mix in broth, puree, nutmeg, and beans and simmer for 10 minutes Mix pasta with sauce and garnish with parsley and parmesan

recipe.title: Red Beans and Rice
recipe.instructions: Soak beans overnight. Drain and rinse well. In large pot, place beans covered in water until it boils. Simmer on low heat for 30 minutes. Rinse and drain well. In a large saucepan, place the beans and other ingredients and simmer over very low heat for two or more hours, until most of the liquid has evaporated. Stir frequently during this process so that the bottom does not burn. Remove the bay leaves. With a slotted spoon, serve beans over a bed of rice.

recipe.title: Red Beans and Sausage
recipe.instructions: Brown sausage in oil for 3-4 minutes Add celery, onion, green pepper, garlic, cook until tender Add water, bay leaves, cayenne pepper, and beans Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes Remove bay leaves

recipe.title: Sczechuan Noodles

ingredient.item: scallions, sliced diagonally (white and green parts)
ingredient.key: scallions, sliced diagonally (white and green parts)

recipe.instructions:
Place the garlic and ginger in a food processor fitted with a steel blade. Add the vegetable oil, tahini, peanut butter, soy sauce, sherry, sherry vinegar, honey, chili oil, sesame oil, and ground peppers. Puree the sauce.
Add a splash of oil to a large pot of boiling salted water and cook the spaghetti al dente. Drain the pasta in a colander, place it in a large bowl, and while still warm, toss with 3/4 of the sauce. Add the red and yellow bell peppers and scallions; toss well. Serve warm or at room temperature. The remaining sauce may be added, as needed, to moisten the pasta.

recipe.title: Seafood Enchiladas
recipe.instructions: Make a roux with the butter, flour, and chicken broth. To make a roux, melt the butter, add flour, stir until smooth, wait a minute, and then slowly add the chikin broth a little at a time, stirring all the time, bring the liquid near a boil before adding When roux is thick (or not, it Cover bottom of 9x13 casserole dish with sauce. Warm tortillas. Sprinkle krab, celery, onions, most of the cheese in each tortilla and roll. Pour rest of sauce on top and bake at 425 degrees 20 minutes. Sprinke remaining cheese on top and cook for 5 more minutes.

recipe.title: Seafood Fettuccini
recipe.instructions: Cook fettuccini. Heat butter and garlic in skillet on medium until garlic is slightly browned. Add Krab, whipping cream, and pepper. Heat 3 min. or until mixture Add Parm. cheese, stir for 1 minute Toss with fettuccini.

recipe.title: Southwestern Stuffed Pepeprs
recipe.instructions: Preheat oven to 375 deg. Bring stock pot of water to boil Cut peppers in half or cut off tops Remove seeds and inner ribs and blanch in boliling water for 4 min. Combine corn, beans, cheese, salt, jalapeno, cilantro, salsa, and rice Stuff each pepper with filling and place on baking dish. Add enough water to fill bottom of baking dish Sprinkile each pepper with a dab of butter and pinch of paprika Bake for 20 min. Top with salsa or sour cream and serve with corn chips

recipe.title: Spaghetti Casserole
recipe.instructions: Preheat oven to 400F. Cook spaghetti. Saute onion, green pepper, and tofu in olive oil. Add tomato sauce, wine, corn, tabasco, salt, and pepper. Put cooked spaghetti in bottom of casserole dish and top with the sauce and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes

recipe.title: Spinach artichoke dip
recipe.instructions: Mix all but mozzerella Top with mozzerella Bake at 350 for 30 min

recipe.title: Spinach Veggie Casserole
recipe.instructions: Preheat oven to 350F Cook rice in water Make a roux with the butter, flour, and milk. To make a roux, melt the butter, add flour, stir until smooth, wait a minute, and then slowly add the milk a little at a time, stirring all the time, bring the liquid near a boil before adding more. Saute garlic, onion, pepper, corn, and oil in skillet. When roux has thickened, add 3/4 cheese, salt, pepper, and hot sauce. Add spinach and stir. Combine rice, cheese mixture, and and sauteed veggies and poor in casserole dish. Sprinkle breadcrumbs and remaining cheese on top and cook until cheese melts.

recipe.title: Sweet and Sour Meatball Sauce
recipe.instructions: Combine all ingredients Serve over Vegetarian Meatballs

recipe.title: Sweet Potato Burritos
recipe.instructions: Preheat oven to 350 deg F (175 C). Combine everything except torillas and half cheddar Spoon mixture evenly into tortitillas in casserole dish Top with remaining cheddar Cook for 25-30 minutes.

recipe.title: Sweet-n-sour Chikin
recipe.instructions: Open pineapple, keep juice for sauce after draining. Add soy sauce to taste and cornstarch to desired thickness and stir. Fry up chikin, carrot, and onion (I use peanut oil). When close to done add sauce and stir for a minute or so. Mix in pineapple and serve over rice

recipe.title: Tandoori Chicken Skewers
recipe.instructions: Puree everything but chicken breasts in food processor. Cut chicken into 1/2 inch strips or cubes Marinate chicken in puree for 2 hours Broil chicken for 6 minutes or so on each side Serve with rice and Traditional Indian Dipping Sauce

recipe.title: Thai Peanut Noodles
recipe.instructions: Cook noodles Add peanut butter to coconut milk a little at a time while stirring until smooth Add tamari and sesame oil to taste Stir fry tofu, carrot, and brocolli in peanut oil Combine

recipe.title: Tortilla-Black Bean Casserole
recipe.instructions: preheat oven to 350 deg. Combine everything except tortillas into a sauce Layer tortillas, then sauce, tortillas, sauce, tortillas Top with cheddar Cook for 30 minutes or til cheese is melted

recipe.title: Traditional Indian Dipping Sauce
recipe.instructions: Combine all ingredients and season to taste with salt. Chill until ready to serve

recipe.title: Turkey Andoille Gumbo
recipe.instructions: 1. Cook turkey breast, make stock (1 gallon) from bones 2. Make roux with flour and oil 3. Render sausage, put aside, add peppers, celery and onion to the fat; cook until vegetables begin to soften 4. Add garlic and cook until aroma is released (~ 30 sec.) 5. Add okra, thyme, and spices 6. Add stock, simmer for 10-15 minutes 7. Add roux and stir until dissolved 8. Simmer at least 20 minutes 9. Add sausage, turkey, tomato, file powder, and seasoning to taste 10. Serve over rice

recipe.title: Vegan Sheppard's PIe
recipe.instructions: 1. Chop unpeeled potatoes and boil until tender 2. While potatoes are boiling, chop otehr vegetables and steam 3. Mix marmite or vegemite and flour in a large saucepan and combine with a fork. Add almond, roce, or soy milk; jam; cumin; curry powder; hot sauce; Worstershire sauce, salt and pepper. Bring to boil while whisking constantly, then remove from heat. 4. When potatoes are bolied mash with coconut milk, conola butter, 3 Tbs. dill, 3 Tbs. parsley 5. Add steamed vegetables to gravy mix. Add beans, rest of parsley and dill, and sage 6. Pour vegetable/bean/gravy mix into greased 11x18 in. casserole dish 7. Top with mashed potatoes, carefully using a spoon 8. Draw a fork across potatoes horizontally and vertically to create a ridged matrix. Spray lightly with canola oil 9. Broil for 15-30 minutes until potatoes are goldden and crispy on top.

recipe.title: Vegetarian Meatballs
recipe.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 deg. 2. Oil casserole dish 3. Mix all ingredients. Roll into 2 in. balls. Place in pan.<b> </b>Bake 15 minutes, turn and bake another 15 minutes. 4. Add meatball sauce and bake another 15 minutes.

recipe.title: Vegetarian Taco Casserole
recipe.instructions: Cover bottom of casserole dish with tortilla chips. Saute onion, pepper, garlic, and hash browns. Combine chiles, rice, salsa, chili powder, cumin, oregano, and black beans. Combine with vegetable mixture and heat until warm. Transfer to casserole dish, top with cheese, and bake at 350F for 20 minutes.

recipe.title: Veggie Lasagne
recipe.instructions: Cook noodles Preheat oven to 350 deg Saute veggies Combine with tomato sauce and spices Spread thin layer of sauce layer noodles, sauce, ricotta, mozzerella, noodles, sauce, ricotta, mozzerella, noodles Top with remaining mozzerella and parmesan Cook for 30-40 minutes
